name: Over The Clouds
description:
We are a group of game developement students based in Barcelona, and we've been making games for 3 years. Some of those include Dash&Slice and Madlab. We have different skills and abilities, but together we use the best of us to create unique and innovative videogames.

CREDITS 

Game Design: Pau Blanes

Programming: Adrià Biarnés

Graphics Design: Zheng Binrong

Audio Production: Daniel Candel, Javier Cañizares, Mario Pons
